text0: This is a sample text that is not used in the typing effect, but it is here to show you that you can add more text to the JSON file and it will be displayed in the typing effect.
text1: The AI typing effect is a fun way to display text dynamically. It simulates the experience of typing, which can be engaging for users.

text3:
Here is quite a long paragraph, you can make it load faster with the horizontal slider below, or scroll horizontally for the same effect. The typing effect can be adjusted to be faster or slower based on user preference, making it a versatile feature for various applications. 
Have you ever wondered why an AI doesn't generate the response in full immediately when it can generate an answer within seconds? While you may know the reason, I guess it is just a way to make the interaction feel more natural and engaging, as if you are having a conversation with a real person. People used to write letters and emails that are read by the recipient as completed content. Recently people chat with paragraphs broken down into sentences and sentences broken into short phrases which seems more like real life chatting. 
Would you prefer to have the response like a chat message, or do you like the typing effect?
text4: Bootstrap icons are used in this project to enhance the user interface. The icons are simple and effective, providing a clean look while maintaining functionality. The theme switch button is similar to the one used in the Bootstrap website, allowing users to toggle between light and dark modes easily. The default theme is set to match the user's browser preference, ensuring a consistent experience across different devices.
text5: It looks like I am an AI talking to you, but I am not. I am just a pre-defined sentence that is being displayed with a typing effect.
text6: Thanks for visiting this GitHub Page. Although you probably came from the GitHub repository, the GitHub icon in the bottom can get you to the repository page by tlam-dev in case you wish to. This project is a personal endeavor to create an engaging user interface with a typing effect that mimics AI interactions.
